description: Grilled portobello mushrooms are the star of these simple burgers, stacked with lettuce, tomato, and a lather of dill-and-tarragon sauce.
name: Chargrilled Mushroom Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5ml extra virgin olive oil cooking spray
4 sesame seed briche buns, split, toasted
0.33 cup Birch & Waite Parsley, Dill & Tarragon Seafood Sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a chargrill pan over medium heat. Spray mushrooms with oil. Cook for 5 minutes each side or until tender.
Slice 4 tomatoes. Spread bun bases with dill and tarragon sauce. Top with lettuce, sliced tomato, grilled mushrooms and cheddar cheese. Sandwich with bun tops.
Cut remaining tomatoes into wedges. Combine tomato, onion, bocconcini, salad leaves and basil in a bowl. Drizzle with dressing and toss to combine.
Place burgers on serving plates with salad. Serve.
